title: Calories in Starbucks Oatmeal
meta_description: Learn calories in oatmeal Starbucks, including full nutrition facts for one serving of Hearty Blueberry Oatmeal, carbs, protein, fiber, and easy tweaks.
assumptions: Standard Hearty Blueberry Oatmeal (1 serving ~240 g), includes oats, blueberries, brown sugar, and prepared with 2% milk; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, milk type, and customizations. Check Starbucks app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Starbucks Hearty Blueberry Oatmeal provides ~320 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use nonfat milk instead of 2% milk

faqs.q: How many calories in Starbucks oatmeal?
faqs.a: About 320 kcal for one serving of Hearty Blueberry Oatmeal with 2% milk.

faqs.q: What's the protein in oatmeal Starbucks?
How many carbs in Starbucks blueberry oatmeal?
faqs.a: Approximately 58 g carbs, including 6 g fiber and 20 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is Starbucks oatmeal low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 g total fat per serving, with 1.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Can I customize Starbucks oatmeal to reduce calories?
faqs.a: Yes, skip brown sugar to save ~50 kcal or choose nonfat milk to cut ~20 kcal.
